item.title: How to Track Python Script Completion
item.description: Did your script run to completion? Sure, you might log some tracebacks along the way or terminate the program early with sys.exit(). But did your script actually run completely to the end? I have yet to use the Trace module but it seems worth checking out also. Visualization tools â€¦
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer
